name: Duchess Suite
amenities: ["Breakfast", "Free parking on premises", "TV with standard cable", "Smoke alarm", "Fire extinguisher", "Wifi", "Refrigerator", "Heating", "Crib"]

name: Galiano Island Eagles Nest Retreat Cabin - Private
description:
Strictly 4 nights minimum
The cabin is self-contained and private.

If you wish to use the fire place ***bring your own firewood or it can be purchased at the Corner Store or Garage on the island.***

The hot tub is located on a promontory with a very scenic 180 degree view of ocean, other islands and the glaciers of the Olympic mountains in the far distance to the south.
Walk to the beach,Top of the World (15 minutes) with endless trails.
neighborhood_overview: We are secluded and live in a  peaceful environment. There are many trails  around  that will bring you to a scenic view so you decide which adventure you want.
host_about:
Hi, 

My name is Line Marie and I live on Galiano Island, BC.  Bernard and I have been living on Galiano for an average of 30 years and we can't find anywhere like it on earth.  We love sailing, hiking,camping , gardening and exploring.  
I am a mosaic artist and always looking for like minded people.

I have been in the accommodation business  for the last 30 years.   We enjoy people .   

We live in a very serene environment on one of the most scenic property in the Gulf Islands. We have built the house and we would like to host like minded people.  We are asking guests to view, Cowspiracy (it's free on Netflix) before booking with us.


Line Marie and family

name: Character Suite Inn Victorian Home
description:
Reduced Rate for stays of 7 nights.

Watch the horse carriages go by from comfortable 2nd floor suite. 4pc bath with skylight, queen bed & private Juliette balcony. Welcome!
neighborhood_overview: We are 3 doors from the historic Emily Carr House. The Empress Hotel, Parliament Buildings and Royal BC Museum / Imax are at one end of our street. The Pacific Ocean accessible via trails, beaches and Dallas road promenade are at the other!
host_about: Mom and son enjoy living / hosting in beautiful Victoria!

STADACONA CENTRE:

A convenient strip mall located right across the street from Hilltop Manor. Here's a list of businesses at Stadacona Centre:

-Shine Café: Enjoy breakfast or lunch at this local favorite.
-Subway: You don’t have to go far to get your favorite sub!
-Tartan Toque: Victoria’s first true wing house offering 20 types of wings.
-Cosmo’s Pizza: Pizza, wings, subs and pasta. Pickup and delivery only. I’m a regular!
-Stadacona Food Market: Small local grocery store.
-Origin Bakery: Providing quality, fresh, gluten-free products.

FERNWOOD VILLAGE:

A vibrant community just 1km from Hilltop Manor. A 4 minute drive or 10 minute walk. Here's what you'll find

name: Eagles Nest Oceanfront Galiano West Coast Home
description: Feel at home in an exquisite artist home. There are rooms for everybody to enjoy the generosity of  nature by which we are surrounded.  Explore our many trails and find many spots of great beauty, use the herb garden by the kitchen to  prepare great meals or simply relax...
neighborhood_overview:
We are at the foot hill of Mount Galiano for a wonderful hike and 10 min. on foot to Active pass beach or the Bluff & Bellhouse park.
The Pub, The Wild One , Daystore or Corner Store grocery/wine store market are 5 min. by car. Montague Park is an 8 minutes drive and the Pilgrim Restaurant is at 7 minutes, Robin and Crane is at 8 minutes . At the ferry terminal you will find Babes in the Woods, and the Galiano Inn at 12-15 minutes .
Our location is close to all amenities.
Our little paradise is secluded and very private.
host_about:
Hi, 

My name is Line Marie and I live on Galiano Island, BC.  Bernard and I have been living on Galiano for an average of 30 years and we can't find anywhere like it on earth.  We love sailing, hiking,camping , gardening and exploring.  
I am a mosaic artist and always looking for like minded people.

I have been in the accommodation business  for the last 30 years.   We enjoy people .   

We live in a very serene environment on one of the most scenic property in the Gulf Islands. We have built the house and we would like to host like minded people.  We are asking guests to view, Cowspiracy (it's free on Netflix) before booking with us.


Line Marie and family

Hilltop Manor is located in Rockland, the mansion district of Victoria. This convenient location is close to shopping, public transportation and several lovely neighborhoods. Here’s a list of things to do and places to go within 1km of Hilltop Manor:

STADACONA CENTRE:

A convenient strip mall located right across the street from Hilltop Manor. Here's a list of businesses at Stadacona Centre:

-Shine Café: Enjoy breakfast or lunch at this local favorite.
-Subway: You don’t have to go far to get your favorite sub!
-Tartan Toque: Victoria’s first true wing house offering 20 types of wings.
-Cosmo’s Pizza: Pizza, wings, subs and pasta. Pickup and delivery only. I’m a regular!
-Stada

name: Character home
description:
You may have better price if booking 31 nights or more.

This 1900's Victorian house, newly furnished, has many highlights:
* ROOMY & COMFORTABLE
* NEWLY FURNISHED
* EVERYTHING you can expect at home
* WALKABLE / QUIET & CONVENIENT NEIGHBORHOOD
* SUPER-HOST SERVICES WITH 100% RESPONSE RATE
neighborhood_overview:
In front of our house, we have a lovely PLAYGROUND for kids.
Just 5 minutes walk to the north is MOSS ROCK PARK, a perfect place to see the sunrise with south view of snow-capped Olympic Mountain in the USA and west birdview of downtown Victoria.
Just 3 minutes, you can walk south to CLOVER POINT KITE PARK, where locals fly kites in spring.
16 minutes' walk to Gonzales Bay, another beach perfect for family in the sunset
Don't miss famous ABKHAZI GARDEN in our neighborhood (7 minutes by bike), its tea house open 11:00-17:00 Wen-Sun.
GOVERNMENT HOUSE (20 minutes walk) is another relaxing place.
Your paramount enjoyment includes your beach walk just south of the house.
City of Victoria has arranged various WALKING TOURS, highly recommended. For more info, please check their website. Discoverthepast.
host_about: Welcome to my beautiful home in Fairfield, one of the most desirable locations in Victoria.

description:
Come stay in this private suite centrally located in the heart of Victoria, British Columbia. Everything you need is a short walk away including grocery stores, shopping malls, The Galloping goose trail, and coffee shops. 15 minute drive to the inner harbour and parliament buildings. Enjoy the patio right outside your suite.

Disclosure: Upstairs has original hardwood floors and although the suite was built 2017 & soundproofed, you will hear our twin daughters’ footsteps, etc.

name: James Bay Oceanside 1 Bedroom Suite #4
description:
Private suite in restored heritage 6-plex located right across the street from the beautiful Dallas Road oceanfront in James Bay!
The suite comes fully equipped with everything you need to enjoy your stay in Victoria! Queen size bed with linens, sectional sofa, 50" TV , work desk with wifi, fully equipped kitchen with all cookware, plates, cutlery and more... Just bring your suitecase and we'll take care of the rest!
neighborhood_overview: Private suite in restored heritage 6-plex located right across the street from the beautiful Dallas Road oceanfront in James Bay! Cross the street and take a relaxing stroll down the oceanside or grab a coffee at one of the quaint shops just steps away on Menzies Street. Watch as horse drawn carriages pass by our heritage house throughout the day in this historic part of James Bay. Go out on the town in Downtown's inner harbor, just minutes away.

name: Enchanting Getaway with Ocean View
description: Relax in nature with quick access to parks, attractions, shopping, and the city. Newly renovated space with private access. This is your gateway to island life. 8 mins. from Goldstream Park, 10 mins. from Malahat Skywalk, 30 mins. from Victoria. Watch nature  from your hot tub. Take a walk down to the private creek surrounded by old growth forest, or ask us about other activities. We want you to feel relaxed in our casual suite that includes all you need for a short or longer stay.
neighborhood_overview: We live on the Finlayson Arm about 100 Meters up from the ocean. Most of the properties on Aspen Road are acreages. Our 4 acre property has Camsusa Creek running through it.
host_about: I work for the Government of BC in education and my wife works for Island Health. We love to travel in our free time. We just moved to Vancouver Island and we love exploring new places.

name: Great VIEWS & VIBES! King sized suite 15th floor!
description:
Enjoy stunning Inner Harbour views from this 15th floor modern & spacious corner suite in the heart of downtown Victoria w/ FREE secure parking.

This home is just steps away from the iconic Empress Hotel, Inner Harbour & Parliament buildings.

The suite boasts a chef's kitchen, floor to ceiling windows, open plan living & dining area & a generous King bedroom w/ ensuite.

Unwind on the expansive wrap-around balcony w/ sweeping city views, or enjoy building perks such as the gym, pool & hot tub.
host_about:
I'm a financial accounting teacher from Victoria, Canada who loves to travel. I spend my summers traveling the world and have been to over 65 countries. I'm always on the go and I love meeting new people. 

When I'm not traveling, you can find me on my bike, hiking up a mountain or having a cold beer at the curling rink!
